All well-made cocktails are meant to bring out many different flavors on your palate. Just think about some of the best #cocktails youâ€™ve had â€” many have a punch of sour, which adds a deep, bright flavor. The secret? Often lime juice â€” itâ€™s not just a #garnish on the rim of the glass. Without #lime, some of the most popular and classic cocktails would fall flat (lime juice is key in the #margarita, the Mojito and the gimlet). It helps balance a drink and downplay the strength of the alcohol, which usually means you end up drinking more in the end!â
